title: Adrienne Maloof, 58, strolls with on/off toyboy Jacob Busch, 29... a month after her ex remarried
text:
A month after her ex-husband remarried, The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills alum Adrienne Maloof took a romantic stroll with toyboy Jacob Busch at the Beverly Glen Market in Bel-Air on Wednesday.

At 58, the divorced mother-of-three is nearly twice the Anheuser-Busch heir's age, but they've been dating on and off since 2013.

'When you meet someone they don't have a number on their forehead,' Adrienne - who previously dated Rod Stewart's son Sean - told E! News at the time.

Back together? A month after her ex-husband remarried, The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills alum Adrienne Maloof (L) took a romantic stroll with toyboy Jacob Busch (R) at the Beverly Glen Market in Bel-Air on Wednesday

'He is very easy going': At 58, the divorced mother-of-three is nearly twice the Anheuser-Busch heir's age, but they've been dating on and off since 2013

'He is very easy going. We have a common interest - our families have known each other for a long time. Our great grandfathers knew each other through the liquor industry. When we met we just hit it off. It felt so natural, so organic.'

Jacob - who dated Pitch Perfect funnywoman Rebel Wilson earlier this year - reportedly works as West Coast ambassador for his father Peter W. Busch's foundation.

Last year, Maloof and Busch were snapped partying with her ex-husband #2 Paul Nassif and his now-wife Brittany Pattakos at the Brent Shapiro Foundation Summer Spectacular.

Adrienne told E! News in 2013: 'We have a common interest - our families have known each other for a long time. Our great grandfathers knew each other through the liquor industry. When we met we just hit it off. It felt so natural, so organic' (pictured September 23)

RHOBH cameo: Jacob - who dated Rebel Wilson earlier this year - reportedly works as West Coast ambassador for his father Peter W. Busch's foundation (pictured in 2014)

Divorced in 2012: Last year, Maloof and Busch were snapped partying with her ex-husband #2 Paul Nassif (L) and his now-wife Brittany Pattakos (2-L) at the Brent Shapiro Foundation Summer Spectacular

The former couple divorced in 2012 after a decade of marriage and 'irreconcilable differences.'

At 57, the facial plastic surgeon is 29 years older than the CoolSculpting specialist - and the May-December couple wed September 28 in Bel-Air followed by an October 6 reception in Santorini.

The best friends - who met at a medical meeting - performed their first dance to Lady Gaga's 2018 song Is That Alright? at the luxurious Rocabella Santorini Hotel & Spa in front of 65 guests.

'Absolute dream come true!' At 57, the facial plastic surgeon (L) is 29 years older than the CoolSculpting specialist (R) - and the May-December couple wed September 28 in Bel-Air followed by an October 6 reception in Santorini

Met at a medical meeting: The 'best friends' performed their first dance to Lady Gaga's 2018 song Is That Alright? at the luxurious Rocabella Santorini Hotel & Spa in front of 65 guests

'#momlife': Brittany is now stepmother to Adrienne and Paul's three sons - 13-year-old twins Colin & Christian and 16-year-old Gavin - who also attended the Greek nuptials (pictured September 1)

Brittany is now stepmother to Adrienne and Paul's three sons - 16-year-old Gavin and 13-year-old twins Colin & Christian - who also attended the Greek nuptials.

Nassif next appears in Botched: Most Outrageous Patients Special premiering October 28 on E! followed by the sixth season premiere airing November 4 on the same cable network.

Meanwhile, Maloof keeps busy owning DrinkAde and she's a founding partner of the NHL team, Vegas Golden Knights.
description: Botched star Paul Nassif is 29 years older than his bride Brittany Pattakos, and the May-December duo tied the knot September 28
